templateData.kat: The Bingo Pet can't have its rarity upgraded by {{NPC/PET_SITTER}}.
templateData.leveling:
Unlike other [[Pets]], the '''Bingo Pet''' is an "All Skills Pet", meaning it gains equal amounts of [[Skill]] XP from all sources. It also requires the same amount of xp per level as a {{Common}} pet, regardless of its rarity.
 {{Pet Leveling|common = }}
